conversation.content: I'm in the mood for an intense thriller with lots of action.
Got it! Do you prefer a story involving political intrigue or more of a personal survival theme?
I like when the main character is fighting to protect someone important and is also being chased.

You should definitely check out Angel Has Fallen! 🎬 Gerard Butler stars as a Secret Service agent framed for an attack, racing against time to clear his name and protect the President. Action and loyalty all the way! ❤️🔥
